column4: has anyone been able to get Beryl to work with an ATI Radeon XPRESS 200M card?

do you have the proprietary ATI river running ?

OpenGL vendor string: Mesa project: www.mesa3d.org
You have to first make ATI propriery driver working. And then https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CompositeManager/Xgl
enabling the restricted driver now.
